Hera- You're the Queen of the Gods and the Goddess of marriage, women and birth. You are known to be temperamental but only to those who are unfaithful to you. They will get what they deserve, your revenge knows no limits! When you are not plotting against a traitor, you cherish and value the miracle of life, childbirth and hold onto your vows, who are extremely sacred to you. You are after all.. a Queen!

Rubio cares about the country deeply. He has served the public for 16 years. It's his passion and he works very hard. You are entitled to your opinion, of course. But mine is that Rubio has the best chance of beating Hillary. His story is the essence of the American Dream and I find him to be uplifting and unifying with great ideas! #rubio2016

The US sprayed carcinogenic pesticides on California grape harvesters decades ago. The same systemic pesticide in Canada is regulated to not be applied for at least three weeks prior to harvest. The USA without warning to parents or other adults, aerial spray above pedestrians on side walks & childrens school grounds. Lowest cancer rates are Canadian Inuit & Japanese people due to high consumption of fresh seafoods. Those statistics could now be different since fukashima
